text:
apr_base64_decode_len() is documented as "Determine the length of a plain text
string given the encoded version", but it is really should be "Determine the
maximum buffer length required to store the plain text string given the encoded
version"
creator: Brian.Rectanus@breach.com
Brian.Rectanus@breach.com
text:
